keyval.val: Pre-PLCO dataset. Mark Thornquist used this dataset to create the Final_data_set_unblinded_1-14-2008_a.xls and Final_data_set_unblinded_3-13-2008_a.xls datasets which were given out to the investigators. This dataset contains the markers from all sites and all records are unblinded.
The investigators used this dataset to develop multi-marker algorithms to identify cases. The markers that were developed were later tested in the testing half of the dataset.

The marker values in this dataset are in their original scale (so they are not log transformed and centered and scaled). The columns for HE4 £1, HE4 £2, SMRP £1, SMRP £2, YKL40 £1, YKL40 £2, IGF2 £1, IGF2 £2, DD-O110 £1, DD-O110 £2, DD-C248 £1, DD-C248 £2, DD-P108 £1, DD-P108 £2, DD-X065 £1, DD-X065 £2 should be removed. These markers were measured twice by the Partners lab and only the means were supposed to have been reported. The means for these markers are in the columns called HE4 mean, SMRP mean, YKL40 mean, IGF2 mean, DD-O110 mean, DD-C248 mean, DD-P108 mean, DD-X065 mean. Dataset created by Mark Thornquist.
